overview: The eleventh installment in the Super!! Scary Psychic Video series. This is a video taken at a love hotel that went bankrupt after the incident. It's separated from the main building and the annex, but it is said that there was a murder in a room somewhere. After that, the victim's resentment became a ground-bound spirit, and there was a sighting information that he was wandering around the hotel, so the number of customers was cut off and it was closed. However, the resentment of the victim is still wandering.
title: Super!! Scary Psychic Video 11
